queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:helpdesk_mailboxes` ( `mailbox_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `mailbox_name` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `host` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `email` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `password` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `ticket_prefix` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `smtp_server` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `domain` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `private` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `selector` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'phpmailer', `responsible_admin` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`mailbox_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

CREATE TABLE `?:helpdesk_messages` ( `message_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ticket_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `user_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `message` mediumtext, `notified` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `status` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'O', PRIMARY KEY (`message_id`), KEY `ticket_id` (`ticket_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `?:helpdesk_message_files` ( `file_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `message_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `file_size` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `filename` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`file_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:helpdesk_templates` ( `template_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `template` mediumtext NOT NULL, `user_id` mediumint(8) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `position` smallint(5) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `is_global` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'N', PRIMARY KEY (`template_id`)) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
ALTER TABLE `?:users` ADD `helpdesk_notification` char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Y'
